thread.title: BOERBON, RICH

author: BOERBON, RICH
title: BOERBON, RICH
text: My husband and I ordered the Gaggia Academia Espresso Machine and I can't say enough good things about it. I love it. In fact we named it "Lady Gaggia" Lol. I have at least two - three cups of whatever my mood is in. My husband loves the smoothness and easy operations of the machine and how efficient everything works. WholeLatteLove.com is awesome! Great price, great and fast delivery and covers warranty for 2 years. Thank You so much! I found a New Love! XOXO!
